name: @mayajs/common
description: A Node.js framework for REST API server-side-applications.

scripts.clean: rimraf index.js && rimraf index.d.ts && rimraf lib && rimraf interfaces && rimraf types
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run tgz && tsc -w
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run package && tsc --outDir .

author: Mark Anthony C. Ignacio
